name: Rat Jam (Team Wilson)
description:
There will be RAT - Tribution 

In a world where rats are starved of jam, divided in war, one rat seeks to find the origin of the jam and finds YOU!

Defend your jam from countless rats whilst trying to make as much as you can. Buy upgrades, throw rats and destroy your house just so you can keep all of your jam till the end of your journey.

This is joey

He hates you...
